description:
Seamlessly upload pictures from your phone to your Flickr account with just one button. Launching the app launches the camera instantly, and you can just begin snapping pictures. The pictures are then automatically uploaded in the background. You can also choose to manually select pictures from your phone to upload.

New in Version 1.0.2
- Added Ability to set default upload folder in preference

If you have any questions, issues or suggestions, send a direct email to ingloriousapps@gmail.com. Check out other Inglorious Apps: Notes, Voices, Casa, Plickr, Crushed, Bouncey & MediaVault
versionNote: Added Ability to set default upload folder in preference
